AttributeDefinition.Description: Moderation levels for messages detected as spam.

AttributeDefinition.name: sendMessageDenyNotification

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.OPIDENT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Operator ID for use by BMS - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: classes assigned to this operator to which BMS (basic mapping support) messages are to be routed - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.OPPRTY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Priority of the operator - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.TIMEOUT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time, in hours and minutes, that the operator is allowed to be idle before being signed off. - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS.XRFSOFF
AttributeDefinition.Description: FORCE means that the user is signed off by CICS when an XRF takeover occurs - CICS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DFP.DATAAPPL
AttributeDefinition.Description: DFP data application identifier - DFP segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.ALTGRP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Alternate console group used in recovery - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.AUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: authority this console has to issue operator commands (MASTER,ALL,INFO,CONS,IO,SYS) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.AUTO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether the extended console can receive messages that have been automated by the Message Processing Facility (MPF) in the sysplex (YES / NO) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.CMDSYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: System name to which commands issued from this console are sent - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.DOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this console receives delete operator message (DOM)requests (NORMAL / ALL / NONE) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.KEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name to display information for all consoles with the specified key by using the MVS command DISPLAY CONSOLES,KEY - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.LEVEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Messages this console receives (R, I, CE, E, IN, NB or ALL) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.LOGCMDRESP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether command responses are logged (YES / NO) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MFORM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Format in which messages are displayed at the console (J, M, S, T, X) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MIGID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Migration ID which is assigned to this console - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MONITOR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Information displayed when jobs, TSO sessions, or data set status are being monitored - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.MSCOPE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Systems from which this console can receive messages that are not directed to a specific console - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.ROUTCODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Routing codes of messages this console receives - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.STORAGE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Amount of storage in megabytes in the TSO address space that can be used for message queuing to this console - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OPERPARM.UD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this console is to receive undelivered messages (YES / NO) - OPERPARM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.ACCTNUM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO account number when logging on - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.COMMAND
AttributeDefinition.Description: Command run during TSO logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: Default destination to which the system routes dynamically-allocated SYSOUT data sets - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.MAXSIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum region size the user can request at logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default logon procedure name when logging on through TSO logon panel - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.SECLABEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Security label entered or used during TSO LOGON - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.SIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default or requested region size during TSO logon - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.UNIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default name of a device or group of devices that a procedure uses for allocations - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO.USERDATA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Optional installation data defined for the user - TSO segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: Account number for APPC processing - part of WORKATTR segment.

AttributeDefinition.Description: RLIMIT_AS hard limit (maximum) resource value that processes receive when they are dubbed a process - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: RLIMIT_CPU hard limit (maximum) resource value that OMVS processes receive when they are dubbed a process - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.FILEPROCMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of files this user is allowed to have concurrently active or open - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.HOME
AttributeDefinition.Description: OMVS initial directory pathname - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum amount of data space storage, in pages, that can be allocated by the user for memory mappings of OMVS files - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.PROCUSERMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of processes this user is allowed to have active at the same time, regardless of how the process became OMVS process - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: First program started when TSO command OMVS is entered or when a batch job is started using the BPXBATCH program - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OMVS.THREADSMAX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of pthread_create threads, including those running, queued, and exited but not detached, that this user can have concurrently active - OMVS segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: Lotus Notes for zOS short-name of the user - LNOTES segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: Novell Directory Services for zOS user-name of the user - NDS segment

AttributeDefinition.Description: Default MCS console name used for this operator. Relevant when no console name is used on the NetView GETCONID command - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.CTL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a security check is performed for this NetView operator when trying to use a span or trying to do a cross-domain logon (GENERAL, GLOBAL, SPECIFIC) - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.DOMAINS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifiers of NetView programs in another NetView domain where this operator can start a cross-domain session - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.IC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Command or command list to be processed by NetView for this operator when this operator logs on to NetView - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.MSGRECVR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether this operator is to receive unsolicited messages that are not routed to a specific NetView operator - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.NGMFADMN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a NetView operator has administrator authority to the NetView Graphic Monitor Facility (NGMF). - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.NGMFVSPN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Reserved for future use by the NetView Graphic Monitor Facility - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: NETVIEW.OPCLASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: NetView scope classes for which the operator has authority - NETVIEW segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.AUTOLOGIN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether OMVS DCE is to log this user into OMVS DCE automatically - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.DCENAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE principal name defined for this RACF user in the DCE registry - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.HOMECELL
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE cell name defined for this RACF user - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.HOMEUUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE universal unique identifier (UUID) for the cell that this user is defined to - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DCE.UUID
AttributeDefinition.Description: DCE universal unique identifier (UUID) of the DCE principal defined in DCENAME - DCE segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OVM.FSROOT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Pathname for the file system root - OVM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OVM.PROGRAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: PROGRAM pathname of OMVS shell program) - OVM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.LDAPHOST
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL of the LDAP server which the zOS LDAP server contacts when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY segment

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDDN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Distinguished name (DN) which the zOS LDAP server uses when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY segment

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password which the zOS LDAP server uses when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY segment

AttributeDefinition.name: OWNER
AttributeDefinition.Description: RACF defined user or group which is the owner of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: UNIVERSAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Universal group with effectively unlimited number of users who may be connected to it

AttributeDefinition.name: MODEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: A discrete MVS data set profile whcih is the model for new data sets of this group

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.CREATE_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when this group was defined to RACF

AttributeDefinition.name: SUBGROUP
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of all groups which this group is their SUPGROUP

AttributeDefinition.name: TERMUACC
AttributeDefinition.Description: During terminal authorization checking, RACF allows any user in the group access to a terminal based on the universal access authority for that terminal

AttributeDefinition.name: OVM.GID
AttributeDefinition.Description: OpenExtensions VM group identifier - OVM segment

AttributeDefinition.name: DFP.DATAAPPL
AttributeDefinition.Description: DFP data application identifier - DFP segment

AttributeDefinition.name: TME.ROLES
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of roles that reference this group - TME segment

AttributeDefinition.name: email
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary email address of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: secondEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: Secondary email address of user typically used for account recovery

AttributeDefinition.name: displayName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the user, suitable for display to end users

AttributeDefinition.name: nickName
AttributeDefinition.Description: Casual way to address the user in real life

AttributeDefinition.name: honorificPrefix
AttributeDefinition.Description: Honorific prefix(es) of the user, or title in most Western languages

AttributeDefinition.name: profileUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL of user's online profile (e.g. a web page)

AttributeDefinition.name: primaryPhone
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary phone number of user such as home number

AttributeDefinition.name: streetAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Full street address component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: city
AttributeDefinition.Description: City or locality component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: state
AttributeDefinition.Description: State or region component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: zipCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: Zipcode or postal code component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: countryCode
AttributeDefinition.Description: Country name component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: postalAddress
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mailing address component of user's address

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: User's preferred written or spoken languages

AttributeDefinition.name: locale
AttributeDefinition.Description: User's default location for purposes of localizing items such as currency, date time format, numerical representations, etc

AttributeDefinition.name: userType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to identify the organization to user relationship such as "Employee" or "Contractor"

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeNumber
AttributeDefinition.Description: Organization or company assigned unique identifier for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: costCenter
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of cost centre assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: manager
AttributeDefinition.Description: Display name of the user's manager

AttributeDefinition.name: status
AttributeDefinition.Description: Status of the user. e.g. ACTIVE, PROVISIONED, DEPROVISIONED etc

AttributeDefinition.name: activated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when transition to ACTIVE status completed

AttributeDefinition.name: lastUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when user was last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: passwordChanged
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when password was last changed

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Administrator roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: lastMembershipUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when group's memberships were last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: type
AttributeDefinition.Description: Determines how a group's profile and memberships are managed

AttributeDefinition.name: lastUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when group's profile was last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: label
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique user-defined display name for application

AttributeDefinition.name: lastUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Timestamp when application was last updated

AttributeDefinition.name: ASSIGNMENT_ACTION_CODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Person's primary assignment's action code i.e. HIRE

AttributeDefinition.name: ASSIGNMENT_BUSINESS_UNIT_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Person's primary assignment business unit id

AttributeDefinition.name: ASSIGNMENT_EFFECTIVE_START_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Person's primary assignment effective start date

AttributeDefinition.name: ASSIGNMENT_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Person's primary assignment effective end date

AttributeDefinition.name: LEGAL_ENTITY_ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Id of legal employer's legal entity

AttributeDefinition.name: WORK_TELEPHONE

AttributeDefinition.name: WORK_MOBILE

entry.key: You are not authorized to change

entry.value: BAD PASSWORD: Password is too similar to the old one.

entry.key: BAD PASSWORD: it is based on a dictionary word
entry.value: BAD PASSWORD: Password is based on a dictionary word.

entry.key: is not in the sudoers file. This incident will be reported.

AttributeDefinition.name: login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user can log in to the system with the login command

AttributeDefinition.name: su
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether another user can switch to the specified user account with the su command

AttributeDefinition.name: rlogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permits access to the account from a remote location with the telnet or rlogin commands

AttributeDefinition.name: daemon
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates whether the user specified by the Name parameter can run programs using the cron daemon or the src (system resource controller) daemon

AttributeDefinition.name: dce_export
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allows the DCE registry to overwrite the local user information with the DCE user information during a DCE export operation

AttributeDefinition.name: sugroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the groups that can use the su command to switch to the specified user account

AttributeDefinition.name: admgroups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the groups that the user administrates

AttributeDefinition.name: tpath
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the user's trusted path status

AttributeDefinition.name: ttys
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the terminals that can access the account specified by the Name parameter

AttributeDefinition.name: expires
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the expiration date of the account

AttributeDefinition.name: auth1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the primary methods for authenticating the user

AttributeDefinition.name: auth2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the secondary methods used to authenticate the user

AttributeDefinition.name: logintimes
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the days and times that the user is allowed to access the system

AttributeDefinition.name: loginretries
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of unsuccessful login attempts allowed after the last successful login before the system locks the account

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdwarntime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of days before the system issues a warning that a password change is required

AttributeDefinition.name: account_locked
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user account is locked

AttributeDefinition.name: minage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum age (in weeks) a password must be before it can be changed

AttributeDefinition.name: maxage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum age (in weeks) of a password

AttributeDefinition.name: maxexpired
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password

AttributeDefinition.name: minalpha
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of alphabetic characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minother
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: mindiff
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of characters required in a new password that were not in the old password

AttributeDefinition.name: maxrepeats
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the maximum number of times a character can be repeated in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minlen
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum length of a password

AttributeDefinition.name: histexpire
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the period of time (in weeks) that a user cannot reuse a password

AttributeDefinition.name: histsize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse

AttributeDefinition.name: pwdchecks
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the password restriction methods enforced on new passwords

AttributeDefinition.name: default_roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the default roles for the user

AttributeDefinition.name: fsize
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the soft limit for the largest file a user's process can create or extend

AttributeDefinition.name: cpu
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the soft limit for the largest amount of system unit time (in seconds) that a user's process can use

AttributeDefinition.name: data
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest data segment for a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: stack
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest process stack segment for a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: core
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the soft limit for the largest core file a user's process can create

AttributeDefinition.name: rss
AttributeDefinition.Description: The soft limit for the largest amount of physical memory a user's process can allocate

AttributeDefinition.name: nofiles
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the soft limit for the number of file descriptors a user process may have open at one time

AttributeDefinition.name: stack_hard
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the largest process stack segment of a user's process

AttributeDefinition.name: time_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the number of seconds since the epoch (00:00:00 GMT, January 1, 1970) since the last successful login

AttributeDefinition.name: tty_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the terminal on which the user last logged in

AttributeDefinition.name: host_last_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the host from which the user last logged in

AttributeDefinition.name: unsuccessful_login_count
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the number of unsuccessful login attempts since the last successful login

AttributeDefinition.name: lastPasswordUpdated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Specifies the time when user's password last updated.

AttributeDefinition.name: roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The administrative roles for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies the groups to which user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: host_last_unsuccessful_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies last unsuccessful login of host

AttributeDefinition.name: minloweralpha
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of alphabetic characters in lowercase that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minupperalpha
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of alphabetic characters in uppercase that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: minspecialchar
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of special characters that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: mindigit
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the minimum number of digit that must be in a new password

AttributeDefinition.name: tty_last_unsuccessful_login
AttributeDefinition.Description: Identifies last unsuccessful login of host from tty

AttributeDefinition.name: admin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Defines the administrative status of the group

AttributeDefinition.name: users
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of one or more users in the form: User1,User2,...,Usern. Separate group member names with commas

AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether a message is sent to the security console and to a designated person each time this user enters the system

AttributeDefinition.name: TRACE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 creates SMF loggings for all data set and resource access attempts made by this user

AttributeDefinition.name: MON_LOG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether an SMF record is written (for the Invalid Password - Authority Log, ACFRPTPW) each time this user enters the system

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO_TRC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 traces all TSO commands issued by this user for the Command Statistics Report (ACFRPTCR)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACTIVE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Activates the logonid one minute after midnight on the date contained in this field

AttributeDefinition.name: EXPIRE
AttributeDefinition.Description: When the privileges for this logonid will expire

AttributeDefinition.name: CSDATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date that the CANCEL, SUSPEND, MON-LOG, or MONITOR field was set for this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: CSWHO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid of the user who set the CANCEL, SUSPEND, MON-LOG, or MONITOR field for this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACCOUNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can insert, list, change, and delete logonid records

AttributeDefinition.name: LEADER
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can display and alter certain fields of logonid records for other users.

AttributeDefinition.name: AUDIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can display the records and parameters of the CA ACF2 system.

AttributeDefinition.name: CONSULT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can display other logonid records

AttributeDefinition.name: REFRESH
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can issue the F ACF2,REFRESH operator command to update GSO

AttributeDefinition.name: READALL
AttributeDefinition.Description: User has read and execute access to all data sets at the site

AttributeDefinition.name: PROGRAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Program (name or mask) must be used to submit jobs for this logonid

AttributeDefinition.name: SCPLIST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Scope record that restricts accesses for this privileged user

AttributeDefinition.name: TSO
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can log on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: JOB
AttributeDefinition.Description: Batch or background jobs can use this logonid

AttributeDefinition.name: STC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is for use by started tasks only

AttributeDefinition.name: CICS
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can sign on to CICS

AttributeDefinition.name: IMS
AttributeDefinition.Description: user can sign on to IMS

AttributeDefinition.name: BDT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Address space for this logonid belongs to the Bulk Data Transfer (BDT) product

AttributeDefinition.name: TAPE_BLP
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can use full bypass label processing (BLP) when accessing tape data sets

AttributeDefinition.name: TAPE_LBL
AttributeDefinition.Description: User has limited bypass label processing authority when using tapes

AttributeDefinition.name: SUBAUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Jobs that specify this logonid can be submitted only through APF-authorized programs

AttributeDefinition.name: LOGSHIFT
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can access the system outside of the time period specified in the SHIFT field of the logonid record

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTODUMP
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 takes an SVC dump whenever a data set or resource violation occurs

AttributeDefinition.name: DUMPAUTH
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can generate a dump, even in an execute-only environment

AttributeDefinition.name: RESTRICT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is for production use only. A restricted logonid does not require a password for user verification

AttributeDefinition.name: RULEVLD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Access rule must authorize any data set accesses that a user makes

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_STORE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User cannot store or delete rule sets

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_INH
AttributeDefinition.Description: Network job cannot inherit this logonid from its submitter

AttributeDefinition.name: MAINT
AttributeDefinition.Description: A logonid can access data sets without CA ACF2 rule validation or loggings by means of a specified program executed from a specified library

AttributeDefinition.name: NON_CNCL
AttributeDefinition.Description: A user with the NON-CNCL privilege defined in their logonid record has full access to any data set or resource despite any security violations that can occur during the access attempt

AttributeDefinition.name: PPGM
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can execute the protected programs specified in the GSO PPGM record

AttributeDefinition.name: SYNCNODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the node where the synchronized logonid for a user resides. This node name is the logical node name as defined by a NETNODE record.

AttributeDefinition.name: CMD_PROP
AttributeDefinition.Description: user can use the SET TARGET command or the TARGET parameter on the INSERT, CHANGE, LIST, and DELETE commands to override the global CPF target list

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_CNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: System accesses counter made by this logonid since it was created (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: The date of the last system access by this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_SRCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logical or physical input source name or source group name from which this user last accessed the system. (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: ACC_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time of the last system access by this user (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time when a password was last changed

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_DAT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date of the last invalid password or password phrase attempt (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_TIM
AttributeDefinition.Description: last time a user entered an invalid password (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_SRC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logical or physical input source name or source group name from which a user last entered an invalid password (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_INV
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of password violations that occurred since the last successful logon (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_VIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of password violations that occurred on PSWD_DAT

AttributeDefinition.name: MAXDAYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum number of days permitted between password changes before the password expires

AttributeDefinition.name: MINDAYS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Minimum number of days that must elapse before a user can change their password

AttributeDefinition.name: DFT_DEST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default remote destination for TSO-spun SYSOUT data sets

AttributeDefinition.name: DFT_PFX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO prefix that is set in the user profile at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_ACCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify an account number at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: PMT_ACCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 requires a user to specify an account number at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify the TSO procedure name at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: PMT_PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 requires a user to specify a TSO procedure name at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_RCVR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to use the recover option of the TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_SIZE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User is authorized to specify any region size at logon time (overriding TSOSIZE)

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify the TSO session time limit at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_UNIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify the TSO unit name at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_DEST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to specify a remote output destination at TSO logon that overrides the value specified in the DFT-DEST field

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_MSG
AttributeDefinition.Description: User has permission to specify a message class at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: LGN_PERF
AttributeDefinition.Description: permission to specify a performance group at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: MODE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User wants to receive modal messages from TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: CONSOLE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permits user to access the TSO CONSOLE facility

AttributeDefinition.name: PAUSE
AttributeDefinition.Description: User wants a program to pause when a multilevel message is issued by a command executed in a CLIST

AttributeDefinition.name: PROMPT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 prompts a user for missing or incorrect parameters

AttributeDefinition.name: MOUNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permission to issue mounts for devices

AttributeDefinition.name: RECOVER
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can specify the recover option of the TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOCMDS
AttributeDefinition.Description: TSO command list module name that contains the list of commands that this user is authorized to use

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOFSCRN
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can use the full-screen logon display

AttributeDefinition.name: TSORBA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Mail Index Record Pointer (MIRP) for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: TSOTIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default TSO time parameter, which is the CPU time limit (in minutes) associated with the TSO session

AttributeDefinition.name: INTERCOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: User is willing to accept messages from other users through the TSO SEND command

AttributeDefinition.name: JCL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the ability to submit batch jobs from TSO and to use SUBMIT, STATUS, CANCEL, and OUTPUT commands

AttributeDefinition.name: MAIL
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can receive mail messages from TSO at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: NOTICES
AttributeDefinition.Description: User can receive TSO notices at logon time

AttributeDefinition.name: CHAR
AttributeDefinition.Description: TSO character-delete character for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: ATTR2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables a site to do TSO command limiting when you use SYS1.UADS instead of the Logonid database

AttributeDefinition.name: CMD_LONG
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 should bypass the TSO command list feature for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: VLD_ACCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 validates the TSO account number of a user

AttributeDefinition.name: VLD_PROC
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 validates the TSO procedure name of a user

AttributeDefinition.name: MSGID
AttributeDefinition.Description: User wants TSO messages to have message IDs prefixed

AttributeDefinition.name: ALLCMDS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the ability to bypass the CA ACF2 restricted command lists by entering a special prefix character

AttributeDefinition.name: ACF2CICS
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA ACF2 CICS security is to be initialized in any CICS region running with this address space logonid

AttributeDefinition.name: IDLE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Maximum time permitted (in minutes) between terminal transactions for this user

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSDLID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default logonid for a multiple-user single address space system (MUSASS) address space

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSUPDT
AttributeDefinition.Description: A MUSASS logonid with this privilege has the authority to make calls on behalf of users who are updating the databases

AttributeDefinition.name: SOURCE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logical or physical input source name or source group name from which a user must access the system

AttributeDefinition.name: SHIFT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Shift record name that defines the period during which a user can log on to the system

AttributeDefinition.name: ZONE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Zone record name that defines the time zone from which this logonid normally accesses the system

AttributeDefinition.name: PREFIX
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prefix key of the rule used to validate access to a data set

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP1
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP2
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP3
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP4
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP5
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP6
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP7
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: AUTHSUP8
AttributeDefinition.Description: Extended user authentication (EUA) routine for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: SMSINFO
AttributeDefinition.Description: CONTROL(SMS) record name that contains the default storage management class values for a user

AttributeDefinition.name: RSRCVLD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Resource rule must authorize any resource accesses that a user makes

AttributeDefinition.name: PRIV_CTL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is valid for dynamic logonid privileges

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_UPP
AttributeDefinition.Description: New password is to be upper-case

AttributeDefinition.name: LDS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether logonid administrative changes for this user were propagated to all active Lightweight-Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) servers in the network

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSASS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Logonid is for a multiple-user single address space system, such as CICS or IMS

AttributeDefinition.name: MUSIDINF
AttributeDefinition.Description: MUSID field should be used to restrict access to a MUSASS region for CA ACF2 Info type system entry calls

AttributeDefinition.name: NOMAXVIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevents the user violation counter from incrementing and MAXVIO processing from occurring

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_OMVS
AttributeDefinition.Description: User cannot use any z/OS UNIX System Services

AttributeDefinition.name: NO_STATS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last access statistics on a successful full validation (ACVAMVAL) MUSASS signon request are bypassed

AttributeDefinition.name: PP_TRC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 creates SMF loggings that contain the Active Library List for all data set access attempts made by this logonid in a batch job

AttributeDefinition.name: PP_TRCV
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether CA ACF2 creates SMF loggings that contain the Active Library List for all data set access violations made by this logonid in a batch job

AttributeDefinition.name: PSWD_XTR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password for the logonid is halfway encrypted and can be extracted by an APF-authorized program

AttributeDefinition.name: PTICKET
AttributeDefinition.Description: Passticket can be used with a userid that has the RESTRICT attribute

AttributeDefinition.name: SYSPEXCL
AttributeDefinition.Description: When the system is active in a sysplex enivronment, this logonid record should not be written to the structure

AttributeDefinition.name: TDISKVLD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Access rules must exist for all data on temporary disks that this user accesses

AttributeDefinition.name: UNICNTR
AttributeDefinition.Description: User also resides on the CA Common Services (CCS) platform

AttributeDefinition.name: VLDRSTCT
AttributeDefinition.Description: PROGRAM and SUBAUTH are to be validated even when this RESTRICTed logonid is inherited

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDDN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Distinguished name (DN) which will be used in conjunction with the BIND password if the LDAP Server needs to supply an administrator or user identity to BIND with another LDAP server - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDPTOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time the BINDPW field was last changed - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.BINDPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password for the DN defined in the BINDDN parameter - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PROXY.LDAPHOST
AttributeDefinition.Description: URL of the LDAP server that the zOS LDAP Server will contact when acting as a proxy on behalf of a requester - PROXY user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.AUTOUIDL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Automatically assigns a LINUXUID value when there is an active GSO AUTOIDLX record that specifies ASSIGNU - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXGRP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the LINUX group profile record - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXHOM
AttributeDefinition.Description: Pathname of the Initial Directory when a user enters a Linux command or the ISPF shell - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXNAM
AttributeDefinition.Description: LINUX Application User Identity - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: LINUX.LINUXPGM
AttributeDefinition.Description: LINUX Service Shell Program when Linux command is first entered - LINUX user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KEYRING.DEFAULT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Record key of a CERTDATA certificate record that is to be used as the default certificate for this key ring

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.ACTIVE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when the profile record associating the user to the certificate becomes active - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.CERTID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Serial number and certification authority's distinguished name as extracted from the certificate - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.DSA
AttributeDefinition.Description: Key pair has been generated using the Digital Signature Algorithm instead of the RSA algorithm - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.DSN
AttributeDefinition.Description: zOS data set that contains the digital certificate that is inserted into a CERTDATA profile record - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.EXPIRE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date which gives the security administrator the ability to specify when the profile record associating the user to the certificate expires - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.HITRUST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Certificate is both highly trusted and trusted - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.ICSF
AttributeDefinition.Description: Private key for the certificate is placed in ICSF - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.LABEL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Label to be associated with the certificate - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.PCICC
AttributeDefinition.Description: PCICC was specified on the GENCERT or INSERT command - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.SUBJDN
AttributeDefinition.Description: Subject distinguished name as extracted from the certificate - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CERTDATA.TRUST
AttributeDefinition.Description: Certificate is trusted - CERTDATA user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: KERBLINK.KBLKNAME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Userid that is to be associated with the foreign principal - KERBLINK user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PASSWORD.@PSWDCNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of previous passwords stored in the record for extended password history - PASSWORD user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: PASSWORD.@PWD_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time of the user current password - PASSWORD user profile

AttributeDefinition.name: CRE_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time that a logonid record was created (read only)

AttributeDefinition.name: PWP_VIO
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of password phrase violations that occurred on PSWD-DAT

AttributeDefinition.name: PWPHRASE.PWP_EXP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Password phrase has been manually expired

AttributeDefinition.name: PWPHRASE.PWP_TOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date and time when a password phrase was last changed

AttributeDefinition.name: UIDMASKS
AttributeDefinition.Description: UID mask which defines this Group. (All users matching this UID mask belong to this group)

AttributeDefinition.name: GlobalSubscriptionStatus

AttributeDefinition.name: TimeApprover

Script.Source: return identity.getName();
return identity.getFirstname();
return identity.getLastname();
return identity.getFullName();

AttributeDefinition.name: id
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for a SCIM resource

AttributeDefinition.name: externalId
AttributeDefinition.Description: A String that is an identifier for the resource

AttributeDefinition.name: nickName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The casual way to address the user in real life

AttributeDefinition.name: profileUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: A fully qualified URL to a page representing the Users Online profile

AttributeDefinition.name: userType
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to identify the organization to user relationship

AttributeDefinition.name: preferredLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the User's preferred written or spoken language

AttributeDefinition.name: locale
AttributeDefinition.Description: Used to indicate the User's default location for purposes of localizing items

AttributeDefinition.name: timezone
AttributeDefinition.Description: The User's time zone in the Olson timezone database format

AttributeDefinition.name: formattedName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes

AttributeDefinition.name: familyName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The family name (last name) of the User

AttributeDefinition.name: givenName
AttributeDefinition.Description: The family name (last name) of the User

AttributeDefinition.name: middleName

AttributeDefinition.name: honorificPrefix

AttributeDefinition.name: honorificSuffix

AttributeDefinition.name: employeeNumber

AttributeDefinition.name: department

AttributeDefinition.name: managerId

AttributeDefinition.name: groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of groups or profile this user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: SCTYKEY
AttributeDefinition.Description: CICS security keys an ACID may use.

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_COUNT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of times the ACID has been used (logon times since user was defined)

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_CPU
AttributeDefinition.Description: CPU ID where last logon was done

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_DATE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date when last logon was done by user.

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_FAC
AttributeDefinition.Description: Facility name used for last logon

AttributeDefinition.name: LAST_USED_TIME
AttributeDefinition.Description: Time when last logon was done by user

AttributeDefinition.name: INFO.LAST_MOD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last date and time when ACID was updated

AttributeDefinition.name: PHRASE_INTERVAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which password phrase remains valid

AttributeDefinition.name: INTERVAL
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of days during which password remains valid

AttributeDefinition.name: DEFNODES
AttributeDefinition.Description: list of default routing nodes for an individual ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: CONSOLE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Ability to modify control options by ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: ACID is allowed to bypass suspension due to violations (VTHRESH and PTHRESH)

AttributeDefinition.name: NOADSP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent data sets, created by an ACID, from being automatically secured

AttributeDefinition.name: NOATS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Automatic Terminal Signons which are made for this ACID will fail.

AttributeDefinition.name: NODSNCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA Top Secret bypasses all data set access security checks for this ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: NOLCFCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to execute any command or transaction for all facilities, regardless of LCF (Limited Command Facility) restrictions

AttributeDefinition.name: NOPWCHG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACID from changing passwords at signon or initiation

AttributeDefinition.name: NORESCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass security checking for all owned resources except data sets and volumes

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUBCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass alternate ACID usage as well as all job submission security checking

AttributeDefinition.name: NOVOLCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass volume level security checking

AttributeDefinition.name: DUFUPD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables ACID to use the CA Top Secret Application Interface to update the installation data (INSTDATA) or field data from a Security Record. DUFUPD is a component of the CA Top Secret Dynamic Update Facility (DUF)

AttributeDefinition.name: DUFXTR
AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables ACID to use a RACROUTE REQUEST=AUTH (RACHECK) macro or the CA Top Secret Application Interface to extract installation data (INSTDATA) or field data from a Security File. DUFXTR is a component of the CA Top Secret Dynamic Update Facility (DUF)

AttributeDefinition.name: MULTIPW
AttributeDefinition.Description: ACID has multiple password attributes, which means ACID needs a different password to access each facility

AttributeDefinition.name: TRACE
AttributeDefinition.Description: Diagnostic trace is set on all ACID activity (initiations, resource access, violations, security mode).

AttributeDefinition.name: OIDCARD
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prompt ACID to insert identification cards into a batch reader whenever signing on to TSO

AttributeDefinition.name: PHYSKEY

AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (ALL, SMS, TSO, NDT, DLF, APPCLU, WORKATTR, TARGET)

AttributeDefinition.Description: Authority to perform one or more administrative functions (ALL, SDT, PTOK)

AttributeDefinition.name: ADMIN.FACILITY
AttributeDefinition.Description: Which facility or facilities an ACID may access

AttributeDefinition.Description: Limit the SCOPE of ACID authority based on these values

AttributeDefinition.name: AUDIT
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow an audit of ACID activity

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUSPEND
AttributeDefinition.Description: ACID is allowed to bypass suspension due to violations (VTHRESH and PTHRESH)

AttributeDefinition.name: NOADSP
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent data sets, created by an ACID, from being automatically secured

AttributeDefinition.name: NOATS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Automatic Terminal Signons which are made for this ACID will fail

AttributeDefinition.name: NODSNCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: CA Top Secret bypasses all data set access security checks for this ACID

AttributeDefinition.name: NOLCFCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to execute any command or transaction for all facilities, regardless of LCF (Limited Command Facility) restrictions

AttributeDefinition.name: NOPWCHG
AttributeDefinition.Description: Prevent ACID from changing passwords at signon or initiation

AttributeDefinition.name: NORESCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass security checking for all owned resources except data sets and volumes

AttributeDefinition.name: NOSUBCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass alternate ACID usage as well as all job submission security checking

AttributeDefinition.name: NOVOLCHK
AttributeDefinition.Description: Allow ACID to bypass volume level security checking

AttributeDefinition.Description: Enables ACID to use a RACROUTE REQUEST=AUTH (RACHECK) macro or the CA Top Secret Application Interface to extract installation data (INSTDATA) or field data from a Security File. DUFXTR is a component of the CA Top Secret Dynamic Update Facility (DUF)

AttributeDefinition.name: middleName
AttributeDefinition.Description: the middle name for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: suffix
AttributeDefinition.Description: the suffix (or list of suffixes) for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: privilege
AttributeDefinition.Description: the privileges assigned to the personnel

AttributeDefinition.name: birthdate
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time of birth for the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.name: username
AttributeDefinition.Description: the user name associated with the account. The value of the user name field must be unique within the system.

AttributeDefinition.name: directoryIndicator
AttributeDefinition.Description: It contains an indicator of whether or not the user is an LDAP directory user.

AttributeDefinition.name: restriction
AttributeDefinition.Description: the restrictions given to an account.

AttributeDefinition.name: title
AttributeDefinition.Description: the title (or list of titles) for the personnel, Dr. Mr. etc

AttributeDefinition.Description: an indicator of whether or not the personnel is a physician

AttributeDefinition.name: position
AttributeDefinition.Description: the position assigned to the personnel.

AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time at which the personnel becomes/became effective

AttributeDefinition.name: endEffectiveDateTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: the date/time at which the personnel ceases/ceased to be effective.

AttributeDefinition.name: organizationGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: organization groups associated to the personnel

AttributeDefinition.name: confidentialityLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: the confidentiality level that applies to the relationship with organization

Field.name: ContactComment

AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag that indicates if the user password expired

AttributeDefinition.name: PasswordLastChanged
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date timestamp of user last password changed

AttributeDefinition.Description: Flag indicates the user neverexpires password

AttributeDefinition.name: LastLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date timestamp of user last login

AttributeDefinition.name: LastFailedLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Date timestamp of user last failed login

AttributeDefinition.name: Rights
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of rights defined for user

AttributeDefinition.name: ProductID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the Product mapped to Role

AttributeDefinition.name: VTBMenuKey
AttributeDefinition.Description: Menukey which is mapped to each Role

FilterTemplate.FilterString: #if($parts.size() == 1) firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") || lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") || name.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") || displayName.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") #elseif($parts.size() == 2) (firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") && lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(1)")) || (firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(1)") && lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)")) || displayName.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0) $parts.get(1)") || firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0) $parts.get(1)") || name.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0) $parts.get(1)") #elseif($parts.size() > 2) #foreach($part in $parts) firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") || lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") || name.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") || displayName.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") #if($velocityCount < $parts.size()) || #end #end #end
